basic_information.sub_industry: Information Technology and Digital Recruitment Services

company_profile.company_description: Peoplebank Australia QLD is part of Australia's largest IT & Digital recruitment company with over 35 years of experience. As a member of the RGF Staffing family and subsidiary of Recruit Holdings (Tokyo Stock Exchange), Peoplebank specializes in permanent and contract placement of ICT professionals across all vertical markets, making over 4,000 placements annually. The Queensland division focuses on technology recruitment across Brisbane and regional Queensland markets.

mission_vision_values.mission: To connect exceptional IT and digital talent with organizations across Australia, delivering comprehensive recruitment solutions that drive business success and career growth
mission_vision_values.vision: To be Australia's premier IT and digital recruitment partner, leveraging global resources and local expertise to address critical skill shortages in the technology sector
core_values: Commitment to Candidate and Client Success
mission_vision_values.philosophy: Combining 35+ years of Australian market expertise with global resources from the world's largest staffing network to deliver transformative recruitment outcomes

revenue_streams.description: Full-time placement services for technology professionals across all seniority levels
revenue_streams.market_focus: Software development, cybersecurity, cloud infrastructure, data analytics, and digital transformation roles

revenue_streams.description: Short-term, project-based, and contract technology resource placement
revenue_streams.market_focus: Government contracts, enterprise projects, and specialized technical consulting

revenue_streams.description: Senior leadership and C-level technology executive placements
revenue_streams.market_focus: CTO, IT Directors, and senior technology management roles

revenue_streams.description: Comprehensive workforce solutions and consulting through Leaders IT division
revenue_streams.market_focus: Project services, enterprise applications, data reporting, and security consulting

revenue_streams.description: Specialized recruitment services for federal and state government departments
revenue_streams.market_focus: 34-year track record providing IT resources to Australian government agencies

target_markets: Financial services organizations requiring digital transformation
Healthcare and insurance sectors needing IT expertise
Consulting firms requiring specialized technical talent
geographic_coverage: Gold Coast and Sunshine Coast regions
National coverage through parent company network
International capabilities through RGF Staffing global network
business_model.business_model_type: Technology-specialized recruitment agency with focus on long-term client partnerships, contractor retention (99% completion rate), and comprehensive workforce solutions leveraging global parent company resources

leadership_team.name: Tim Moran
leadership_team.position: Executive General Manager - Peoplebank Australia and Leaders IT
leadership_team.background: Over 20 years recruitment industry experience, started at Michael Page, 11+ years at SThree as Regional Director Asia Pacific, former CEO of Ignite, co-founded The Cypher Network specializing in digital and cyber advisory
leadership_team.expertise: Digital recruitment strategy, cyber security talent acquisition, Asia Pacific market leadership

leadership_team.name: Nathan Coletz
leadership_team.background: 20+ years recruitment experience, former National IT Director at Talent2, QLD Director at Hudson, multiple GM roles with IT agencies, responsible for Leaders IT consulting business relaunch in Queensland
leadership_team.expertise: Queensland market operations, IT agency management, consulting business development

leadership_team.name: Brent Leahy
leadership_team.position: Chief Executive Officer - RGF Staffing APEJ (Former Peoplebank Executive)
leadership_team.background: Former Executive General Manager of Peoplebank, promoted to CEO of parent company RGF Staffing APEJ
leadership_team.expertise: Staffing industry leadership, Asia Pacific operations, strategic business development

industry_analysis.industry_name: Information Technology and Digital Recruitment Services
industry_analysis.industry_growth: High growth driven by critical IT skills shortage, digital transformation demand, and government digitization initiatives
industry_analysis.market_size: Part of Australia's multi-billion dollar recruitment industry with projected IT spending of AU$146.85 billion in 2025 (8.7% increase)
key_trends: Cloud infrastructure and DevOps expertise critical shortage
AI and automation driving software engineering demand
Government digital transformation creating sustained contract opportunities
Remote and hybrid work models changing recruitment landscape
Increased job tenure and emphasis on career security in 2025

competitive_landscape.market_position: Australia's largest IT & Digital recruitment company with 35+ years market leadership
competitive_advantages: Government sector expertise with 34-year track record
Comprehensive service portfolio (permanent, contract, executive, consulting)

target_customer_segments.characteristics: Large technology organizations with continuous hiring needs across multiple specializations
target_customer_segments.needs: Permanent and contract technology professionals, executive leadership, and specialized consulting

target_customer_segments.characteristics: Organizations requiring digital transformation and cybersecurity expertise
target_customer_segments.needs: Specialized technology talent for digital banking, fintech, and security initiatives

target_customer_segments.characteristics: Healthcare organizations digitalizing operations and implementing new technologies
target_customer_segments.needs: Technology professionals with healthcare domain expertise and compliance knowledge

partnerships_alliances.example: Cloud platforms (AWS, Azure), cybersecurity tools, enterprise software
